00027 /*
00028  * There are two APIs:
00029  *  1. APIs that take the actual parameters expanded.  This is for other
00030  *  entities that would like to link against the library and call the APIs
00031  *  directly without having to form an intermediate representation.
00032  *  2. APIs that take a YAML file and parses out the information there and
00033  *  calls the APIs mentioned in 1
00034  */
00035 
00036 #include <errno.h>
00037 #include <limits.h>
00038 #include <netdb.h>
00039 #include <stdio.h>
00040 #include <stdlib.h>
00041 #include <string.h>
00042 #include <sys/ioctl.h>
00043 #include <libcfs/util/ioctl.h>
00044 #include <lnet/lnetctl.h>
00045 #include <lnet/socklnd.h>
00046 #include "liblnd.h"
00047 #include "liblnetconfig.h"
00048 #include "cyaml.h"
00049 
00050 #define CONFIG_CMD              "configure"
00051 #define UNCONFIG_CMD            "unconfigure"
00052 #define ADD_CMD                 "add"
00053 #define DEL_CMD                 "del"
00054 #define SHOW_CMD                "show"
00055 
00056 int lustre_lnet_config_lib_init(void)
00057 {
00058         return register_ioc_dev(LNET_DEV_ID, LNET_DEV_PATH,
00059                                 LNET_DEV_MAJOR, LNET_DEV_MINOR);
00060 }
00061 
00062 int lustre_lnet_config_ni_system(bool up, bool load_ni_from_mod,
00063                                  int seq_no, struct cYAML **err_rc)
00064 {
00065         struct libcfs_ioctl_data data;
00066         unsigned int opc;
00067         int rc;
00068         char err_str[LNET_MAX_STR_LEN];
00069 
00070         snprintf(err_str, sizeof(err_str), "\"Success\"");
00071 
00072         LIBCFS_IOC_INIT(data);
00073 
00074         /* Reverse logic is used here in order not to change
00075          * the lctl utility */
00076         data.ioc_flags = load_ni_from_mod ? 0 : 1;
00077 
00078         opc = up ? IOC_LIBCFS_CONFIGURE : IOC_LIBCFS_UNCONFIGURE;
00079 
00080         rc = l_ioctl(LNET_DEV_ID, opc, &data);
00081         if (rc != 0) {
00082                 snprintf(err_str,
00083                         sizeof(err_str),
00084                         "\"LNet %s error: %s\"", (up) ? "configure" :
00085                         "unconfigure", strerror(errno));
00086                 rc = -errno;
00087         }
00088 
00089         cYAML_build_error(rc, seq_no, (up) ? CONFIG_CMD : UNCONFIG_CMD,
00090                           "lnet", err_str, err_rc);
00091 
00092         return rc;
00093 }
00094 
00095 int lustre_lnet_config_route(char *nw, char *gw, int hops, int prio,
00096                              int seq_no, struct cYAML **err_rc)
00097 {
00098         struct lnet_ioctl_config_data data;
00099         lnet_nid_t gateway_nid;
00100         int rc = LUSTRE_CFG_RC_NO_ERR;
00101         __u32 net = LNET_NIDNET(LNET_NID_ANY);
00102         char err_str[LNET_MAX_STR_LEN];
00103 
00104         snprintf(err_str, sizeof(err_str), "\"Success\"");
00105 
00106         if (nw == NULL || gw == NULL) {
00107                 snprintf(err_str,
00108                          sizeof(err_str),
00109                          "\"missing mandatory parameter(s): '%s'\"",
00110                          (nw == NULL && gw == NULL) ? "network, gateway" :
00111                          (nw == NULL) ? "network" : "gateway");
00112                 rc = LUSTRE_CFG_RC_MISSING_PARAM;
00113                 goto out;
00114         }
00115 
00116         net = libcfs_str2net(nw);
00117         if (net == LNET_NIDNET(LNET_NID_ANY)) {
00118                 snprintf(err_str,
00119                          sizeof(err_str),
00120                          "\"cannot parse net %s\"", nw);
00121                 rc = LUSTRE_CFG_RC_BAD_PARAM;
00122                 goto out;
00123         }
00124 
00125         if (LNET_NETTYP(net) == CIBLND    ||
00126             LNET_NETTYP(net) == OPENIBLND ||
00127             LNET_NETTYP(net) == IIBLND    ||
00128             LNET_NETTYP(net) == VIBLND) {
00129                 snprintf(err_str,
00130                          sizeof(err_str),
00131                          "\"obselete LNet type '%s'\"", libcfs_lnd2str(net));
00132                 rc = LUSTRE_CFG_RC_BAD_PARAM;
00133                 goto out;
00134         }
00135 
00136         gateway_nid = libcfs_str2nid(gw);
00137         if (gateway_nid == LNET_NID_ANY) {
00138                 snprintf(err_str,
00139                         sizeof(err_str),
00140                         "\"cannot parse gateway NID '%s'\"", gw);
00141                 rc = LUSTRE_CFG_RC_BAD_PARAM;
00142                 goto out;
00143         }
00144 
00145         if (hops == -1) {
00146                 /* hops is undefined */
00147                 hops = LNET_UNDEFINED_HOPS;
00148         } else if (hops < 1 || hops > 255) {
00149                 snprintf(err_str,
00150                         sizeof(err_str),
00151                         "\"invalid hop count %d, must be between 1 and 255\"",
00152                         hops);
00153                 rc = LUSTRE_CFG_RC_OUT_OF_RANGE_PARAM;
00154                 goto out;
00155         }
00156 
00157         if (prio == -1) {
00158                 prio = 0;
00159         } else if (prio < 0) {
00160                 snprintf(err_str,
00161                          sizeof(err_str),
00162                         "\"invalid priority %d, must be greater than 0\"",
00163                         prio);
00164                 rc = LUSTRE_CFG_RC_OUT_OF_RANGE_PARAM;
00165                 goto out;
00166         }
00167 
00168         LIBCFS_IOC_INIT_V2(data, cfg_hdr);
00169         data.cfg_net = net;
00170         data.cfg_config_u.cfg_route.rtr_hop = hops;
00171         data.cfg_config_u.cfg_route.rtr_priority = prio;
00172         data.cfg_nid = gateway_nid;
00173 
00174         rc = l_ioctl(LNET_DEV_ID, IOC_LIBCFS_ADD_ROUTE, &data);
00175         if (rc != 0) {
00176                 rc = -errno;
00177                 snprintf(err_str,
00178                          sizeof(err_str),
00179                          "\"cannot add route: %s\"", strerror(errno));
00180                 goto out;
00181         }
00182 
00183 out:
00184         cYAML_build_error(rc, seq_no, ADD_CMD, "route", err_str, err_rc);
00185 
00186         return rc;
00187 }
00188 
00189 int lustre_lnet_del_route(char *nw, char *gw,
00190                           int seq_no, struct cYAML **err_rc)
00191 {
00192         struct lnet_ioctl_config_data data;
00193         lnet_nid_t gateway_nid;
00194         int rc = LUSTRE_CFG_RC_NO_ERR;
00195         __u32 net = LNET_NIDNET(LNET_NID_ANY);
00196         char err_str[LNET_MAX_STR_LEN];
00197 
00198         snprintf(err_str, sizeof(err_str), "\"Success\"");
00199 
00200         if (nw == NULL || gw == NULL) {
00201                 snprintf(err_str,
00202                          sizeof(err_str),
00203                          "\"missing mandatory parameter(s): '%s'\"",
00204                          (nw == NULL && gw == NULL) ? "network, gateway" :
00205                          (nw == NULL) ? "network" : "gateway");
00206                 rc = LUSTRE_CFG_RC_MISSING_PARAM;
00207                 goto out;
00208         }
00209 
00210         net = libcfs_str2net(nw);
00211         if (net == LNET_NIDNET(LNET_NID_ANY)) {
00212                 snprintf(err_str,
00213                          sizeof(err_str),
00214                          "\"cannot parse net '%s'\"", nw);
00215                 rc = LUSTRE_CFG_RC_BAD_PARAM;
00216                 goto out;
00217         }
00218 
00219         if (LNET_NETTYP(net) == CIBLND    ||
00220             LNET_NETTYP(net) == OPENIBLND ||
00221             LNET_NETTYP(net) == IIBLND    ||
00222             LNET_NETTYP(net) == VIBLND) {
00223                 snprintf(err_str,
00224                          sizeof(err_str),
00225                          "\"obselete LNet type '%s'\"", libcfs_lnd2str(net));
00226                 rc = LUSTRE_CFG_RC_BAD_PARAM;
00227                 goto out;
00228         }
00229 
00230         gateway_nid = libcfs_str2nid(gw);
00231         if (gateway_nid == LNET_NID_ANY) {
00232                 snprintf(err_str,
00233                          sizeof(err_str),
00234                          "\"cannot parse gateway NID '%s'\"", gw);
00235                 rc = LUSTRE_CFG_RC_BAD_PARAM;
00236                 goto out;
00237         }
00238 
00239         LIBCFS_IOC_INIT_V2(data, cfg_hdr);
00240         data.cfg_net = net;
00241         data.cfg_nid = gateway_nid;
00242 
00243         rc = l_ioctl(LNET_DEV_ID, IOC_LIBCFS_DEL_ROUTE, &data);
00244         if (rc != 0) {
00245                 rc = -errno;
00246                 snprintf(err_str,
00247                          sizeof(err_str),
00248                          "\"cannot delete route: %s\"", strerror(errno));
00249                 goto out;
00250         }
00251 
00252 out:
00253         cYAML_build_error(rc, seq_no, DEL_CMD, "route", err_str, err_rc);
00254 
00255         return rc;
00256 }
00257 
00258 int lustre_lnet_show_route(char *nw, char *gw, int hops, int prio, int detail,
00259                            int seq_no, struct cYAML **show_rc,
00260                            struct cYAML **err_rc)
00261 {
00262         struct lnet_ioctl_config_data data;
00263         lnet_nid_t gateway_nid;
00264         int rc = LUSTRE_CFG_RC_OUT_OF_MEM;
00265         int l_errno = 0;
00266         __u32 net = LNET_NIDNET(LNET_NID_ANY);
00267         int i;
00268         struct cYAML *root = NULL, *route = NULL, *item = NULL;
00269         struct cYAML *first_seq = NULL;
00270         char err_str[LNET_MAX_STR_LEN];
00271         bool exist = false;
00272 
00273         snprintf(err_str, sizeof(err_str),
00274                  "\"out of memory\"");
00275 
00276         if (nw != NULL) {
00277                 net = libcfs_str2net(nw);
00278                 if (net == LNET_NIDNET(LNET_NID_ANY)) {
00279                         snprintf(err_str,
00280                                  sizeof(err_str),
00281                                  "\"cannot parse net '%s'\"", nw);
00282                         rc = LUSTRE_CFG_RC_BAD_PARAM;
00283                         goto out;
00284                 }
00285 
00286                 if (LNET_NETTYP(net) == CIBLND    ||
00287                     LNET_NETTYP(net) == OPENIBLND ||
00288                     LNET_NETTYP(net) == IIBLND    ||
00289                     LNET_NETTYP(net) == VIBLND) {
00290                         snprintf(err_str,
00291                                  sizeof(err_str),
00292                                  "\"obsolete LNet type '%s'\"",
00293                                  libcfs_lnd2str(net));
00294                         rc = LUSTRE_CFG_RC_BAD_PARAM;
00295                         goto out;
00296                 }
00297         } else {
00298                 /* show all routes without filtering on net */
00299                 net = LNET_NIDNET(LNET_NID_ANY);
00300         }
00301 
00302         if (gw != NULL) {
00303                 gateway_nid = libcfs_str2nid(gw);
00304                 if (gateway_nid == LNET_NID_ANY) {
00305                         snprintf(err_str,
00306                                  sizeof(err_str),
00307                                  "\"cannot parse gateway NID '%s'\"", gw);
00308                         rc = LUSTRE_CFG_RC_BAD_PARAM;
00309                         goto out;
00310                 }
00311         } else
00312                 /* show all routes with out filtering on gateway */
00313                 gateway_nid = LNET_NID_ANY;
00314 
00315         if ((hops < 1 && hops != -1) || hops > 255) {
00316                 snprintf(err_str,
00317                          sizeof(err_str),
00318                          "\"invalid hop count %d, must be between 0 and 256\"",
00319                          hops);
00320                 rc = LUSTRE_CFG_RC_OUT_OF_RANGE_PARAM;
00321                 goto out;
00322         }
00323 
00324         /* create struct cYAML root object */
00325         root = cYAML_create_object(NULL, NULL);
00326         if (root == NULL)
00327                 goto out;
00328 
00329         route = cYAML_create_seq(root, "route");
00330         if (route == NULL)
00331                 goto out;
00332 
00333         for (i = 0;; i++) {
00334                 LIBCFS_IOC_INIT_V2(data, cfg_hdr);
00335                 data.cfg_count = i;
00336 
00337                 rc = l_ioctl(LNET_DEV_ID, IOC_LIBCFS_GET_ROUTE, &data);
00338                 if (rc != 0) {
00339                         l_errno = errno;
00340                         break;
00341                 }
00342 
00343                 /* filter on provided data */
00344                 if (net != LNET_NIDNET(LNET_NID_ANY) &&
00345                     net != data.cfg_net)
00346                         continue;
00347 
00348                 if (gateway_nid != LNET_NID_ANY &&
00349                     gateway_nid != data.cfg_nid)
00350                         continue;
00351 
00352                 if (hops != -1 &&
00353                     hops != data.cfg_config_u.cfg_route.rtr_hop)
00354                         continue;
00355 
00356                 if (prio != -1 &&
00357                     prio != data.cfg_config_u.cfg_route.rtr_priority)
00358                         continue;
00359 
00360                 /* default rc to -1 incase we hit the goto */
00361                 rc = -1;
00362                 exist = true;
00363 
00364                 item = cYAML_create_seq_item(route);
00365                 if (item == NULL)
00366                         goto out;
00367 
00368                 if (first_seq == NULL)
00369                         first_seq = item;
00370 
00371                 if (cYAML_create_string(item, "net",
00372                                         libcfs_net2str(data.cfg_net)) == NULL)
00373                         goto out;
00374 
00375                 if (cYAML_create_string(item, "gateway",
00376                                         libcfs_nid2str(data.cfg_nid)) == NULL)
00377                         goto out;
00378 
00379                 if (detail) {
00380                         if (cYAML_create_number(item, "hop",
00381                                                 data.cfg_config_u.cfg_route.
00382                                                         rtr_hop) ==
00383                             NULL)
00384                                 goto out;
00385 
00386                         if (cYAML_create_number(item, "priority",
00387                                                 data.cfg_config_u.
00388                                                 cfg_route.rtr_priority) == NULL)
00389                                 goto out;
00390 
00391                         if (cYAML_create_string(item, "state",
00392                                                 data.cfg_config_u.cfg_route.
00393                                                         rtr_flags ?
00394                                                 "up" : "down") == NULL)
00395                                 goto out;
00396                 }
00397         }
00398 
00399         /* print output iff show_rc is not provided */
00400         if (show_rc == NULL)
00401                 cYAML_print_tree(root);
00402 
00403         if (l_errno != ENOENT) {
00404                 snprintf(err_str,
00405                          sizeof(err_str),
00406                          "\"cannot get routes: %s\"",
00407                          strerror(l_errno));
00408                 rc = -l_errno;
00409                 goto out;
00410         } else
00411                 rc = LUSTRE_CFG_RC_NO_ERR;
00412 
00413         snprintf(err_str, sizeof(err_str), "\"success\"");
00414 out:
00415         if (show_rc == NULL || rc != LUSTRE_CFG_RC_NO_ERR || !exist) {
00416                 cYAML_free_tree(root);
00417         } else if (show_rc != NULL && *show_rc != NULL) {
00418                 struct cYAML *show_node;
00419                 /* find the route node, if one doesn't exist then
00420                  * insert one.  Otherwise add to the one there
00421                  */
00422                 show_node = cYAML_get_object_item(*show_rc, "route");
00423                 if (show_node != NULL && cYAML_is_sequence(show_node)) {
00424                         cYAML_insert_child(show_node, first_seq);
00425                         free(route);
00426                         free(root);
00427                 } else if (show_node == NULL) {
00428                         cYAML_insert_sibling((*show_rc)->cy_child,
00429                                                 route);
00430                         free(root);
00431                 } else {
00432                         cYAML_free_tree(root);
00433                 }
00434         } else {
00435                 *show_rc = root;
00436         }
00437 
00438         cYAML_build_error(rc, seq_no, SHOW_CMD, "route", err_str, err_rc);
00439 
00440         return rc;
00441 }
00442 
00443 int lustre_lnet_config_net(char *net, char *intf, char *ip2net,
00444                            int peer_to, int peer_cr, int peer_buf_cr,
00445                            int credits, char *smp, int seq_no,
00446                            struct lnet_ioctl_config_lnd_tunables *lnd_tunables,
00447                            struct cYAML **err_rc)
00448 {
00449         struct lnet_ioctl_config_lnd_tunables *lnd = NULL;
00450         struct lnet_ioctl_config_data *data;
00451         size_t ioctl_size = sizeof(*data);
00452         char buf[LNET_MAX_STR_LEN];
00453         int rc = LUSTRE_CFG_RC_NO_ERR;
00454         char err_str[LNET_MAX_STR_LEN];
00455 
00456         snprintf(err_str, sizeof(err_str), "\"success\"");
00457 
00458         /* No need to register lo */
00459         if (net != NULL && !strcmp(net, "lo"))
00460                 return 0;
00461 
00462         if (ip2net == NULL && (intf == NULL || net == NULL)) {
00463                 snprintf(err_str,
00464                          sizeof(err_str),
00465                          "\"mandatory parameter '%s' not specified."
00466                          " Optionally specify ip2net parameter\"",
00467                          (intf == NULL && net == NULL) ? "net, if" :
00468                          (intf == NULL) ? "if" : "net");
00469                 rc = LUSTRE_CFG_RC_MISSING_PARAM;
00470                 goto out;
00471         }
00472 
00473         if (peer_to != -1 && peer_to <= 0) {
00474                 snprintf(err_str,
00475                          sizeof(err_str),
00476                          "\"peer timeout %d, must be greater than 0\"",
00477                          peer_to);
00478                 rc = LUSTRE_CFG_RC_OUT_OF_RANGE_PARAM;
00479                 goto out;
00480         }
00481 
00482         if (ip2net != NULL && strlen(ip2net) >= sizeof(buf)) {
00483                 snprintf(err_str,
00484                          sizeof(err_str),
00485                          "\"ip2net string too long %d\"",
00486                                 (int)strlen(ip2net));
00487                 rc = LUSTRE_CFG_RC_OUT_OF_RANGE_PARAM;
00488                 goto out;
00489         }
00490 
00491         if (lnd_tunables != NULL)
00492                 ioctl_size += sizeof(*lnd_tunables);
00493 
00494         data = calloc(1, ioctl_size);
00495         if (data == NULL)
00496                 goto out;
00497 
00498         if (ip2net == NULL)
00499                 snprintf(buf, sizeof(buf) - 1, "%s(%s)%s",
00500                         net, intf,
00501                         (smp) ? smp : "");
00502 
00503         LIBCFS_IOC_INIT_V2(*data, cfg_hdr);
00504         strncpy(data->cfg_config_u.cfg_net.net_intf,
00505                 (ip2net != NULL) ? ip2net : buf, sizeof(buf));
00506         data->cfg_config_u.cfg_net.net_peer_timeout = peer_to;
00507         data->cfg_config_u.cfg_net.net_peer_tx_credits = peer_cr;
00508         data->cfg_config_u.cfg_net.net_peer_rtr_credits = peer_buf_cr;
00509         data->cfg_config_u.cfg_net.net_max_tx_credits = credits;
00510         /* Add in tunable settings if available */
00511         if (lnd_tunables != NULL) {
00512                 lnd = (struct lnet_ioctl_config_lnd_tunables *)data->cfg_bulk;
00513 
00514                 data->cfg_hdr.ioc_len = ioctl_size;
00515                 memcpy(lnd, lnd_tunables, sizeof(*lnd_tunables));
00516         }
00517 
00518         rc = l_ioctl(LNET_DEV_ID, IOC_LIBCFS_ADD_NET, data);
00519         if (rc < 0) {
00520                 rc = -errno;
00521                 snprintf(err_str,
00522                          sizeof(err_str),
00523                          "\"cannot add network: %s\"", strerror(errno));
00524         }
00525         free(data);
00526 
00527 out:
00528         cYAML_build_error(rc, seq_no, ADD_CMD, "net", err_str, err_rc);
00529 
00530         return rc;
00531 }
00532 
00533 int lustre_lnet_del_net(char *nw, int seq_no, struct cYAML **err_rc)
00534 {
00535         struct lnet_ioctl_config_data data;
00536         __u32 net = LNET_NIDNET(LNET_NID_ANY);
00537         int rc = LUSTRE_CFG_RC_NO_ERR;
00538         char err_str[LNET_MAX_STR_LEN];
00539 
00540         snprintf(err_str, sizeof(err_str), "\"success\"");
00541 
00542         if (nw == NULL) {
00543                 snprintf(err_str,
00544                          sizeof(err_str),
00545                          "\"missing mandatory parameter\"");
00546                 rc = LUSTRE_CFG_RC_MISSING_PARAM;
00547                 goto out;
00548         }
00549 
00550         net = libcfs_str2net(nw);
00551         if (net == LNET_NIDNET(LNET_NID_ANY)) {
00552                 snprintf(err_str,
00553                          sizeof(err_str),
00554                          "\"cannot parse net '%s'\"", nw);
00555                 rc = LUSTRE_CFG_RC_BAD_PARAM;
00556                 goto out;
00557         }
00558 
00559         LIBCFS_IOC_INIT_V2(data, cfg_hdr);
00560         data.cfg_net = net;
00561 
00562         rc = l_ioctl(LNET_DEV_ID, IOC_LIBCFS_DEL_NET, &data);
00563         if (rc != 0) {
00564                 rc = -errno;
00565                 snprintf(err_str,
00566                          sizeof(err_str),
00567                          "\"cannot delete network: %s\"", strerror(errno));
00568                 goto out;
00569         }
00570 
00571 out:
00572         cYAML_build_error(rc, seq_no, DEL_CMD, "net", err_str, err_rc);
00573 
00574         return rc;
00575 }
00576 
00577 int lustre_lnet_show_net(char *nw, int detail, int seq_no,
00578                          struct cYAML **show_rc, struct cYAML **err_rc)
00579 {
00580         char *buf;
00581         struct lnet_ioctl_config_lnd_tunables *lnd_cfg;
00582         struct lnet_ioctl_config_data *data;
00583         struct lnet_ioctl_net_config *net_config;
00584         __u32 net = LNET_NIDNET(LNET_NID_ANY);
00585         int rc = LUSTRE_CFG_RC_OUT_OF_MEM, i, j;
00586         int l_errno = 0;
00587         struct cYAML *root = NULL, *tunables = NULL, *net_node = NULL,
00588                 *interfaces = NULL, *item = NULL, *first_seq = NULL;
00589         int str_buf_len = LNET_MAX_SHOW_NUM_CPT * 2;
00590         char str_buf[str_buf_len];
00591         char *pos;
00592         char err_str[LNET_MAX_STR_LEN];
00593         bool exist = false;
00594         size_t buf_len;
00595 
00596         snprintf(err_str, sizeof(err_str), "\"out of memory\"");
00597 
00598         buf_len = sizeof(*data) + sizeof(*net_config) + sizeof(*lnd_cfg);
00599         buf = calloc(1, buf_len);
00600         if (buf == NULL)
00601                 goto out;
00602 
00603         data = (struct lnet_ioctl_config_data *)buf;
00604 
00605         if (nw != NULL) {
00606                 net = libcfs_str2net(nw);
00607                 if (net == LNET_NIDNET(LNET_NID_ANY)) {
00608                         snprintf(err_str,
00609                                  sizeof(err_str),
00610                                  "\"cannot parse net '%s'\"", nw);
00611                         rc = LUSTRE_CFG_RC_BAD_PARAM;
00612                         goto out;
00613                 }
00614         }
00615 
00616         root = cYAML_create_object(NULL, NULL);
00617         if (root == NULL)
00618                 goto out;
00619 
00620         net_node = cYAML_create_seq(root, "net");
00621         if (net_node == NULL)
00622                 goto out;
00623 
00624         for (i = 0;; i++) {
00625                 pos = str_buf;
00626 
00627                 memset(buf, 0, buf_len);
00628 
00629                 LIBCFS_IOC_INIT_V2(*data, cfg_hdr);
00630                 /*
00631                  * set the ioc_len to the proper value since INIT assumes
00632                  * size of data
00633                  */
00634                 data->cfg_hdr.ioc_len = buf_len;
00635                 data->cfg_count = i;
00636 
00637                 rc = l_ioctl(LNET_DEV_ID, IOC_LIBCFS_GET_NET, data);
00638                 if (rc != 0) {
00639                         l_errno = errno;
00640                         break;
00641                 }
00642 
00643                 /* filter on provided data */
00644                 if (net != LNET_NIDNET(LNET_NID_ANY) &&
00645                     net != LNET_NIDNET(data->cfg_nid))
00646                         continue;
00647 
00648                 /* default rc to -1 in case we hit the goto */
00649                 rc = -1;
00650                 exist = true;
00651 
00652                 net_config = (struct lnet_ioctl_net_config *)data->cfg_bulk;
00653 
00654                 /* create the tree to be printed. */
00655                 item = cYAML_create_seq_item(net_node);
00656                 if (item == NULL)
00657                         goto out;
00658 
00659                 if (first_seq == NULL)
00660                         first_seq = item;
00661 
00662                 if (cYAML_create_string(item, "net",
00663                                         libcfs_net2str(
00664                                                 LNET_NIDNET(data->cfg_nid)))
00665                     == NULL)
00666                         goto out;
00667 
00668                 if (cYAML_create_string(item, "nid",
00669                                         libcfs_nid2str(data->cfg_nid)) == NULL)
00670                         goto out;
00671 
00672                 if (cYAML_create_string(item, "status",
00673                                         (net_config->ni_status ==
00674                                           LNET_NI_STATUS_UP) ?
00675                                             "up" : "down") == NULL)
00676                         goto out;
00677 
00678                 /* don't add interfaces unless there is at least one
00679                  * interface */
00680                 if (strlen(net_config->ni_interfaces[0]) > 0) {
00681                         interfaces = cYAML_create_object(item, "interfaces");
00682                         if (interfaces == NULL)
00683                                 goto out;
00684 
00685                         for (j = 0; j < LNET_MAX_INTERFACES; j++) {
00686                                 if (lustre_interface_show_net(interfaces, j,
00687                                                               detail, data,
00688                                                               net_config) < 0)
00689                                         goto out;
00690                         }
00691                 }
00692 
00693                 if (detail) {
00694                         char *limit;
00695 
00696                         tunables = cYAML_create_object(item, "tunables");
00697                         if (tunables == NULL)
00698                                 goto out;
00699 
00700                         if (cYAML_create_number(tunables, "peer_timeout",
00701                                                 data->cfg_config_u.cfg_net.
00702                                                 net_peer_timeout) == NULL)
00703                                 goto out;
00704 
00705                         if (cYAML_create_number(tunables, "peer_credits",
00706                                                 data->cfg_config_u.cfg_net.
00707                                                 net_peer_tx_credits) == NULL)
00708                                 goto out;
00709 
00710                         if (cYAML_create_number(tunables,
00711                                                 "peer_buffer_credits",
00712                                                 data->cfg_config_u.cfg_net.
00713                                                 net_peer_rtr_credits) == NULL)
00714                                 goto out;
00715 
00716                         if (cYAML_create_number(tunables, "credits",
00717                                                 data->cfg_config_u.cfg_net.
00718                                                 net_max_tx_credits) == NULL)
00719                                 goto out;
00720 
00721                         /* out put the CPTs in the format: "[x,x,x,...]" */
00722                         limit = str_buf + str_buf_len - 3;
00723                         pos += snprintf(pos, limit - pos, "\"[");
00724                         for (j = 0 ; data->cfg_ncpts > 1 &&
00725                                 j < data->cfg_ncpts &&
00726                                 pos < limit; j++) {
00727                                 pos += snprintf(pos, limit - pos,
00728                                                 "%d", net_config->ni_cpts[j]);
00729                                 if ((j + 1) < data->cfg_ncpts)
00730                                         pos += snprintf(pos, limit - pos, ",");
00731                         }
00732                         pos += snprintf(pos, 3, "]\"");
00733 
00734                         if (data->cfg_ncpts > 1 &&
00735                             cYAML_create_string(tunables, "CPT",
00736                                                 str_buf) == NULL)
00737                                 goto out;
00738                 }
00739         }
00740 
00741         /* Print out the net information only if show_rc is not provided */
00742         if (show_rc == NULL)
00743                 cYAML_print_tree(root);
00744 
00745         if (l_errno != ENOENT) {
00746                 snprintf(err_str,
00747                          sizeof(err_str),
00748                          "\"cannot get networks: %s\"",
00749                          strerror(l_errno));
00750                 rc = -l_errno;
00751                 goto out;
00752         } else
00753                 rc = LUSTRE_CFG_RC_NO_ERR;
00754 
00755         snprintf(err_str, sizeof(err_str), "\"success\"");
00756 out:
00757         if (show_rc == NULL || rc != LUSTRE_CFG_RC_NO_ERR || !exist) {
00758                 cYAML_free_tree(root);
00759         } else if (show_rc != NULL && *show_rc != NULL) {
00760                 struct cYAML *show_node;
00761                 /* find the net node, if one doesn't exist
00762                  * then insert one.  Otherwise add to the one there
00763                  */
00764                 show_node = cYAML_get_object_item(*show_rc, "net");
00765                 if (show_node != NULL && cYAML_is_sequence(show_node)) {
00766                         cYAML_insert_child(show_node, first_seq);
00767                         free(net_node);
00768                         free(root);
00769                 } else if (show_node == NULL) {
00770                         cYAML_insert_sibling((*show_rc)->cy_child,
00771                                                 net_node);
00772                         free(root);
00773                 } else {
00774                         cYAML_free_tree(root);
00775                 }
00776         } else {
00777                 *show_rc = root;
00778         }
00779 
00780         cYAML_build_error(rc, seq_no, SHOW_CMD, "net", err_str, err_rc);
00781 
00782         return rc;
00783 }
00784 
00785 int lustre_lnet_enable_routing(int enable, int seq_no, struct cYAML **err_rc)
00786 {
00787         struct lnet_ioctl_config_data data;
00788         int rc = LUSTRE_CFG_RC_NO_ERR;
00789         char err_str[LNET_MAX_STR_LEN];
00790 
00791         snprintf(err_str, sizeof(err_str), "\"success\"");
00792 
00793         LIBCFS_IOC_INIT_V2(data, cfg_hdr);
00794         data.cfg_config_u.cfg_buffers.buf_enable = (enable) ? 1 : 0;
00795 
00796         rc = l_ioctl(LNET_DEV_ID, IOC_LIBCFS_CONFIG_RTR, &data);
00797         if (rc != 0) {
00798                 rc = -errno;
00799                 snprintf(err_str,
00800                          sizeof(err_str),
00801                          "\"cannot %s routing %s\"",
00802                          (enable) ? "enable" : "disable", strerror(errno));
00803                 goto out;
00804         }
00805 
00806 out:
00807         cYAML_build_error(rc, seq_no,
00808                          (enable) ? ADD_CMD : DEL_CMD,
00809                          "routing", err_str, err_rc);
00810 
00811         return rc;
00812 }
00813 
00814 int lustre_lnet_config_buffers(int tiny, int small, int large, int seq_no,
00815                                struct cYAML **err_rc)
00816 {
00817         struct lnet_ioctl_config_data data;
00818         int rc = LUSTRE_CFG_RC_NO_ERR;
00819         char err_str[LNET_MAX_STR_LEN];
00820 
00821         snprintf(err_str, sizeof(err_str), "\"success\"");
00822 
00823         /* -1 indicates to ignore changes to this field */
00824         if (tiny < -1 || small < -1 || large < -1) {
00825                 snprintf(err_str,
00826                          sizeof(err_str),
00827                          "\"tiny, small and large must be >= 0\"");
00828                 rc = LUSTRE_CFG_RC_OUT_OF_RANGE_PARAM;
00829                 goto out;
00830         }
00831 
00832         LIBCFS_IOC_INIT_V2(data, cfg_hdr);
00833         data.cfg_config_u.cfg_buffers.buf_tiny = tiny;
00834         data.cfg_config_u.cfg_buffers.buf_small = small;
00835         data.cfg_config_u.cfg_buffers.buf_large = large;
00836 
00837         rc = l_ioctl(LNET_DEV_ID, IOC_LIBCFS_ADD_BUF, &data);
00838         if (rc != 0) {
00839                 rc = -errno;
00840                 snprintf(err_str,
00841                          sizeof(err_str),
00842                          "\"cannot configure buffers: %s\"", strerror(errno));
00843                 goto out;
00844         }
00845 
00846 out:
00847         cYAML_build_error(rc, seq_no, ADD_CMD, "buf", err_str, err_rc);
00848 
00849         return rc;
00850 }
00851 
00852 int lustre_lnet_show_routing(int seq_no, struct cYAML **show_rc,
00853                              struct cYAML **err_rc)
00854 {
00855         struct lnet_ioctl_config_data *data;
00856         struct lnet_ioctl_pool_cfg *pool_cfg = NULL;
00857         int rc = LUSTRE_CFG_RC_OUT_OF_MEM;
00858         int l_errno = 0;
00859         char *buf;
00860         char *pools[LNET_NRBPOOLS] = {"tiny", "small", "large"};
00861         int buf_count[LNET_NRBPOOLS] = {0};
00862         struct cYAML *root = NULL, *pools_node = NULL,
00863                      *type_node = NULL, *item = NULL, *cpt = NULL,
00864                      *first_seq = NULL, *buffers = NULL;
00865         int i, j;
00866         char err_str[LNET_MAX_STR_LEN];
00867         char node_name[LNET_MAX_STR_LEN];
00868         bool exist = false;
00869 
00870         snprintf(err_str, sizeof(err_str), "\"out of memory\"");
00871 
00872         buf = calloc(1, sizeof(*data) + sizeof(*pool_cfg));
00873         if (buf == NULL)
00874                 goto out;
00875 
00876         data = (struct lnet_ioctl_config_data *)buf;
00877 
00878         root = cYAML_create_object(NULL, NULL);
00879         if (root == NULL)
00880                 goto out;
00881 
00882         pools_node = cYAML_create_seq(root, "routing");
00883         if (pools_node == NULL)
00884                 goto out;
00885 
00886         for (i = 0;; i++) {
00887                 LIBCFS_IOC_INIT_V2(*data, cfg_hdr);
00888                 data->cfg_hdr.ioc_len = sizeof(struct lnet_ioctl_config_data) +
00889                                         sizeof(struct lnet_ioctl_pool_cfg);
00890                 data->cfg_count = i;
00891 
00892                 rc = l_ioctl(LNET_DEV_ID, IOC_LIBCFS_GET_BUF, data);
00893                 if (rc != 0) {
00894                         l_errno = errno;
00895                         break;
00896                 }
00897 
00898                 exist = true;
00899 
00900                 pool_cfg = (struct lnet_ioctl_pool_cfg *)data->cfg_bulk;
00901 
00902                 snprintf(node_name, sizeof(node_name), "cpt[%d]", i);
00903                 item = cYAML_create_seq_item(pools_node);
00904                 if (item == NULL)
00905                         goto out;
00906 
00907                 if (first_seq == NULL)
00908                         first_seq = item;
00909 
00910                 cpt = cYAML_create_object(item, node_name);
00911                 if (cpt == NULL)
00912                         goto out;
00913 
00914                 /* create the tree  and print */
00915                 for (j = 0; j < LNET_NRBPOOLS; j++) {
00916                         type_node = cYAML_create_object(cpt, pools[j]);
00917                         if (type_node == NULL)
00918                                 goto out;
00919                         if (cYAML_create_number(type_node, "npages",
00920                                                 pool_cfg->pl_pools[j].pl_npages)
00921                             == NULL)
00922                                 goto out;
00923                         if (cYAML_create_number(type_node, "nbuffers",
00924                                                 pool_cfg->pl_pools[j].
00925                                                   pl_nbuffers) == NULL)
00926                                 goto out;
00927                         if (cYAML_create_number(type_node, "credits",
00928                                                 pool_cfg->pl_pools[j].
00929                                                    pl_credits) == NULL)
00930                                 goto out;
00931                         if (cYAML_create_number(type_node, "mincredits",
00932                                                 pool_cfg->pl_pools[j].
00933                                                    pl_mincredits) == NULL)
00934                                 goto out;
00935                         /* keep track of the total count for each of the
00936                          * tiny, small and large buffers */
00937                         buf_count[j] += pool_cfg->pl_pools[j].pl_nbuffers;
00938                 }
00939         }
00940 
00941         if (pool_cfg != NULL) {
00942                 item = cYAML_create_seq_item(pools_node);
00943                 if (item == NULL)
00944                         goto out;
00945 
00946                 if (cYAML_create_number(item, "enable", pool_cfg->pl_routing) ==
00947                     NULL)
00948                         goto out;
00949         }
00950 
00951         /* create a buffers entry in the show. This is necessary so that
00952          * if the YAML output is used to configure a node, the buffer
00953          * configuration takes hold */
00954         buffers = cYAML_create_object(root, "buffers");
00955         if (buffers == NULL)
00956                 goto out;
00957 
00958         for (i = 0; i < LNET_NRBPOOLS; i++) {
00959                 if (cYAML_create_number(buffers, pools[i], buf_count[i]) == NULL)
00960                         goto out;
00961         }
00962 
00963         if (show_rc == NULL)
00964                 cYAML_print_tree(root);
00965 
00966         if (l_errno != ENOENT) {
00967                 snprintf(err_str,
00968                          sizeof(err_str),
00969                          "\"cannot get routing information: %s\"",
00970                          strerror(l_errno));
00971                 rc = -l_errno;
00972                 goto out;
00973         } else
00974                 rc = LUSTRE_CFG_RC_NO_ERR;
00975 
00976         snprintf(err_str, sizeof(err_str), "\"success\"");
00977         rc = LUSTRE_CFG_RC_NO_ERR;
00978 
00979 out:
00980         free(buf);
00981         if (show_rc == NULL || rc != LUSTRE_CFG_RC_NO_ERR || !exist) {
00982                 cYAML_free_tree(root);
00983         } else if (show_rc != NULL && *show_rc != NULL) {
00984                 struct cYAML *routing_node;
00985                 /* there should exist only one routing block and one
00986                  * buffers block. If there already exists a previous one
00987                  * then don't add another */
00988                 routing_node = cYAML_get_object_item(*show_rc, "routing");
00989                 if (routing_node == NULL) {
00990                         cYAML_insert_sibling((*show_rc)->cy_child,
00991                                                 root->cy_child);
00992                         free(root);
00993                 } else {
00994                         cYAML_free_tree(root);
00995                 }
00996         } else {
00997                 *show_rc = root;
00998         }
00999 
01000         cYAML_build_error(rc, seq_no, SHOW_CMD, "routing", err_str, err_rc);
01001 
01002         return rc;
01003 }
01004 
01005 int lustre_lnet_show_peer_credits(int seq_no, struct cYAML **show_rc,
01006                                   struct cYAML **err_rc)
01007 {
01008         struct lnet_ioctl_peer peer_info;
01009         int rc = LUSTRE_CFG_RC_OUT_OF_MEM, ncpt = 0, i = 0, j = 0;
01010         int l_errno = 0;
01011         struct cYAML *root = NULL, *peer = NULL, *first_seq = NULL,
01012                      *peer_root = NULL;
01013         char err_str[LNET_MAX_STR_LEN];
01014         bool ncpt_set = false;
01015 
01016         snprintf(err_str, sizeof(err_str),
01017                  "\"out of memory\"");
01018 
01019         /* create struct cYAML root object */
01020         root = cYAML_create_object(NULL, NULL);
01021         if (root == NULL)
01022                 goto out;
01023 
01024         peer_root = cYAML_create_seq(root, "peer");
01025         if (peer_root == NULL)
01026                 goto out;
01027 
01028         do {
01029                 for (i = 0;; i++) {
01030                         LIBCFS_IOC_INIT_V2(peer_info, pr_hdr);
01031                         peer_info.pr_count = i;
01032                         peer_info.pr_lnd_u.pr_peer_credits.cr_ncpt = j;
01033                         rc = l_ioctl(LNET_DEV_ID,
01034                                      IOC_LIBCFS_GET_PEER_INFO, &peer_info);
01035                         if (rc != 0) {
01036                                 l_errno = errno;
01037                                 break;
01038                         }
01039 
01040                         if (ncpt_set != 0) {
01041                                 ncpt = peer_info.pr_lnd_u.pr_peer_credits.
01042                                         cr_ncpt;
01043                                 ncpt_set = true;
01044                         }
01045 
01046                         peer = cYAML_create_seq_item(peer_root);
01047                         if (peer == NULL)
01048                                 goto out;
01049 
01050                         if (first_seq == NULL)
01051                                 first_seq = peer;
01052 
01053                         if (cYAML_create_string(peer, "nid",
01054                                                 libcfs_nid2str
01055                                                  (peer_info.pr_nid)) == NULL)
01056                                 goto out;
01057 
01058                         if (cYAML_create_string(peer, "state",
01059                                                 peer_info.pr_lnd_u.
01060                                                   pr_peer_credits.
01061                                                         cr_aliveness) ==
01062                             NULL)
01063                                 goto out;
01064 
01065                         if (cYAML_create_number(peer, "refcount",
01066                                                 peer_info.pr_lnd_u.
01067                                                   pr_peer_credits.
01068                                                         cr_refcount) == NULL)
01069                                 goto out;
01070 
01071                         if (cYAML_create_number(peer, "max_ni_tx_credits",
01072                                                 peer_info.pr_lnd_u.
01073                                                   pr_peer_credits.
01074                                                     cr_ni_peer_tx_credits)
01075                             == NULL)
01076                                 goto out;
01077 
01078                         if (cYAML_create_number(peer, "available_tx_credits",
01079                                                 peer_info.pr_lnd_u.
01080                                                   pr_peer_credits.
01081                                                     cr_peer_tx_credits)
01082                             == NULL)
01083                                 goto out;
01084 
01085                         if (cYAML_create_number(peer, "available_rtr_credits",
01086                                                 peer_info.pr_lnd_u.
01087                                                   pr_peer_credits.
01088                                                     cr_peer_rtr_credits)
01089                             == NULL)
01090                                 goto out;
01091 
01092                         if (cYAML_create_number(peer, "min_rtr_credits",
01093                                                 peer_info.pr_lnd_u.
01094                                                   pr_peer_credits.
01095                                                     cr_peer_min_rtr_credits)
01096                             == NULL)
01097                                 goto out;
01098 
01099                         if (cYAML_create_number(peer, "tx_q_num_of_buf",
01100                                                 peer_info.pr_lnd_u.
01101                                                   pr_peer_credits.
01102                                                     cr_peer_tx_qnob)
01103                             == NULL)
01104                                 goto out;
01105                 }
01106 
01107                 if (l_errno != ENOENT) {
01108                         snprintf(err_str,
01109                                 sizeof(err_str),
01110                                 "\"cannot get peer information: %s\"",
01111                                 strerror(l_errno));
01112                         rc = -l_errno;
01113                         goto out;
01114                 }
01115 
01116                 j++;
01117         } while (j < ncpt);
01118 
01119         /* print output iff show_rc is not provided */
01120         if (show_rc == NULL)
01121                 cYAML_print_tree(root);
01122 
01123         snprintf(err_str, sizeof(err_str), "\"success\"");
01124         rc = LUSTRE_CFG_RC_NO_ERR;
01125 
01126 out:
01127         if (show_rc == NULL || rc != LUSTRE_CFG_RC_NO_ERR) {
01128                 cYAML_free_tree(root);
01129         } else if (show_rc != NULL && *show_rc != NULL) {
01130                 struct cYAML *show_node;
01131                 /* find the peer node, if one doesn't exist then
01132                  * insert one.  Otherwise add to the one there
01133                  */
01134                 show_node = cYAML_get_object_item(*show_rc,
01135                                                   "peer_credits");
01136                 if (show_node != NULL && cYAML_is_sequence(show_node)) {
01137                         cYAML_insert_child(show_node, first_seq);
01138                         free(peer_root);
01139                         free(root);
01140                 } else if (show_node == NULL) {
01141                         cYAML_insert_sibling((*show_rc)->cy_child,
01142                                              peer_root);
01143                         free(root);
01144                 } else {
01145                         cYAML_free_tree(root);
01146                 }
01147         } else {
01148                 *show_rc = root;
01149         }
01150 
01151         cYAML_build_error(rc, seq_no, SHOW_CMD, "peer_credits", err_str,
01152                           err_rc);
01153 
01154         return rc;
01155 }
01156 
01157 int lustre_lnet_show_stats(int seq_no, struct cYAML **show_rc,
01158                            struct cYAML **err_rc)
01159 {
01160         struct lnet_ioctl_lnet_stats data;
01161         int rc = LUSTRE_CFG_RC_OUT_OF_MEM;
01162         int l_errno;
01163         char err_str[LNET_MAX_STR_LEN];
01164         struct cYAML *root = NULL, *stats = NULL;
01165 
01166         snprintf(err_str, sizeof(err_str), "\"out of memory\"");
01167 
01168         LIBCFS_IOC_INIT_V2(data, st_hdr);
01169 
01170         rc = l_ioctl(LNET_DEV_ID, IOC_LIBCFS_GET_LNET_STATS, &data);
01171         if (rc != 0) {
01172                 l_errno = errno;
01173                 snprintf(err_str,
01174                          sizeof(err_str),
01175                          "\"cannot get lnet statistics: %s\"",
01176                          strerror(l_errno));
01177                 rc = -l_errno;
01178                 goto out;
01179         }
01180 
01181         root = cYAML_create_object(NULL, NULL);
01182         if (root == NULL)
01183                 goto out;
01184 
01185         stats = cYAML_create_object(root, "statistics");
01186         if (stats == NULL)
01187                 goto out;
01188 
01189         if (cYAML_create_number(stats, "msgs_alloc",
01190                                 data.st_cntrs.msgs_alloc) == NULL)
01191                 goto out;
01192 
01193         if (cYAML_create_number(stats, "msgs_max",
01194                                 data.st_cntrs.msgs_max) == NULL)
01195                 goto out;
01196 
01197         if (cYAML_create_number(stats, "errors",
01198                                 data.st_cntrs.errors) == NULL)
01199                 goto out;
01200 
01201         if (cYAML_create_number(stats, "send_count",
01202                                 data.st_cntrs.send_count) == NULL)
01203                 goto out;
01204 
01205         if (cYAML_create_number(stats, "recv_count",
01206                                 data.st_cntrs.recv_count) == NULL)
01207                 goto out;
01208 
01209         if (cYAML_create_number(stats, "route_count",
01210                                 data.st_cntrs.route_count) == NULL)
01211                 goto out;
01212 
01213         if (cYAML_create_number(stats, "drop_count",
01214                                 data.st_cntrs.drop_count) == NULL)
01215                 goto out;
01216 
01217         if (cYAML_create_number(stats, "send_length",
01218                                 data.st_cntrs.send_length) == NULL)
01219                 goto out;
01220 
01221         if (cYAML_create_number(stats, "recv_length",
01222                                 data.st_cntrs.recv_length) == NULL)
01223                 goto out;
01224 
01225         if (cYAML_create_number(stats, "route_length",
01226                                 data.st_cntrs.route_length) == NULL)
01227                 goto out;
01228 
01229         if (cYAML_create_number(stats, "drop_length",
01230                                 data.st_cntrs.drop_length) == NULL)
01231                 goto out;
01232 
01233         if (show_rc == NULL)
01234                 cYAML_print_tree(root);
01235 
01236         snprintf(err_str, sizeof(err_str), "\"success\"");
01237 out:
01238         if (show_rc == NULL || rc != LUSTRE_CFG_RC_NO_ERR) {
01239                 cYAML_free_tree(root);
01240         } else if (show_rc != NULL && *show_rc != NULL) {
01241                 cYAML_insert_sibling((*show_rc)->cy_child,
01242                                         root->cy_child);
01243                 free(root);
01244         } else {
01245                 *show_rc = root;
01246         }
01247 
01248         cYAML_build_error(rc, seq_no, SHOW_CMD, "statistics", err_str, err_rc);
01249 
01250         return rc;
01251 }
01252 
01253 typedef int (*cmd_handler_t)(struct cYAML *tree,
01254                              struct cYAML **show_rc,
01255                              struct cYAML **err_rc);
01256 
01257 static int handle_yaml_config_route(struct cYAML *tree, struct cYAML **show_rc,
01258                                     struct cYAML **err_rc)
01259 {
01260         struct cYAML *net, *gw, *hop, *prio, *seq_no;
01261 
01262         net = cYAML_get_object_item(tree, "net");
01263         gw = cYAML_get_object_item(tree, "gateway");
01264         hop = cYAML_get_object_item(tree, "hop");
01265         prio = cYAML_get_object_item(tree, "priority");
01266         seq_no = cYAML_get_object_item(tree, "seq_no");
01267 
01268         return lustre_lnet_config_route((net) ? net->cy_valuestring : NULL,
01269                                         (gw) ? gw->cy_valuestring : NULL,
01270                                         (hop) ? hop->cy_valueint : -1,
01271                                         (prio) ? prio->cy_valueint : -1,
01272                                         (seq_no) ? seq_no->cy_valueint : -1,
01273                                         err_rc);
01274 }
01275 
01276 static int handle_yaml_config_net(struct cYAML *tree, struct cYAML **show_rc,
01277                                   struct cYAML **err_rc)
01278 {
01279         struct cYAML *net, *intf, *tunables, *seq_no,
01280               *peer_to = NULL, *peer_buf_cr = NULL, *peer_cr = NULL,
01281               *credits = NULL, *ip2net = NULL, *smp = NULL, *child;
01282         struct lnet_ioctl_config_lnd_tunables *lnd_tunables_p = NULL;
01283         struct lnet_ioctl_config_lnd_tunables lnd_tunables;
01284         char devs[LNET_MAX_STR_LEN];
01285         char *loc = devs;
01286         int size = LNET_MAX_STR_LEN;
01287         int num;
01288         bool intf_found = false;
01289 
01290         ip2net = cYAML_get_object_item(tree, "ip2net");
01291         net = cYAML_get_object_item(tree, "net");
01292         intf = cYAML_get_object_item(tree, "interfaces");
01293         if (intf != NULL) {
01294                 /* grab all the interfaces */
01295                 child = intf->cy_child;
01296                 while (child != NULL && size > 0) {
01297                         struct cYAML *lnd_params;
01298 
01299                         if (child->cy_valuestring == NULL)
01300                                 goto ignore_child;
01301 
01302                         if (loc > devs)
01303                                 num  = snprintf(loc, size, ",%s",
01304                                                 child->cy_valuestring);
01305                         else
01306                                 num = snprintf(loc, size, "%s",
01307                                                child->cy_valuestring);
01308                         size -= num;
01309                         loc += num;
01310                         intf_found = true;
01311 
01312                         lnd_params = cYAML_get_object_item(intf,
01313                                                            "lnd tunables");
01314                         if (lnd_params != NULL) {
01315                                 const char *dev_name = child->cy_valuestring;
01316                                 lnd_tunables_p = &lnd_tunables;
01317 
01318                                 lustre_interface_parse(lnd_params, dev_name,
01319                                                        lnd_tunables_p);
01320                         }
01321 ignore_child:
01322                         child = child->cy_next;
01323                 }
01324         }
01325 
01326         tunables = cYAML_get_object_item(tree, "tunables");
01327         if (tunables != NULL) {
01328                 peer_to = cYAML_get_object_item(tunables, "peer_timeout");
01329                 peer_cr = cYAML_get_object_item(tunables, "peer_credits");
01330                 peer_buf_cr = cYAML_get_object_item(tunables,
01331                                                     "peer_buffer_credits");
01332                 credits = cYAML_get_object_item(tunables, "credits");
01333                 smp = cYAML_get_object_item(tunables, "CPT");
01334         }
01335         seq_no = cYAML_get_object_item(tree, "seq_no");
01336 
01337         return lustre_lnet_config_net((net) ? net->cy_valuestring : NULL,
01338                                       (intf_found) ? devs : NULL,
01339                                       (ip2net) ? ip2net->cy_valuestring : NULL,
01340                                       (peer_to) ? peer_to->cy_valueint : -1,
01341                                       (peer_cr) ? peer_cr->cy_valueint : -1,
01342                                       (peer_buf_cr) ?
01343                                         peer_buf_cr->cy_valueint : -1,
01344                                       (credits) ? credits->cy_valueint : -1,
01345                                       (smp) ? smp->cy_valuestring : NULL,
01346                                       (seq_no) ? seq_no->cy_valueint : -1,
01347                                       lnd_tunables_p,
01348                                       err_rc);
01349 }
01350 
01351 static int handle_yaml_config_buffers(struct cYAML *tree,
01352                                       struct cYAML **show_rc,
01353                                       struct cYAML **err_rc)
01354 {
01355         int rc;
01356         struct cYAML *tiny, *small, *large, *seq_no;
01357 
01358         tiny = cYAML_get_object_item(tree, "tiny");
01359         small = cYAML_get_object_item(tree, "small");
01360         large = cYAML_get_object_item(tree, "large");
01361         seq_no = cYAML_get_object_item(tree, "seq_no");
01362 
01363         rc = lustre_lnet_config_buffers((tiny) ? tiny->cy_valueint : -1,
01364                                         (small) ? small->cy_valueint : -1,
01365                                         (large) ? large->cy_valueint : -1,
01366                                         (seq_no) ? seq_no->cy_valueint : -1,
01367                                         err_rc);
01368 
01369         return rc;
01370 }

01372 static int handle_yaml_config_routing(struct cYAML *tree,
01373                                       struct cYAML **show_rc,
01374                                       struct cYAML **err_rc)
01375 {
01376         int rc = LUSTRE_CFG_RC_NO_ERR;
01377         struct cYAML *seq_no, *enable;
01378 
01379         seq_no = cYAML_get_object_item(tree, "seq_no");
01380         enable = cYAML_get_object_item(tree, "enable");
01381 
01382         if (enable) {
01383                 rc = lustre_lnet_enable_routing(enable->cy_valueint,
01384                                                 (seq_no) ?
01385                                                     seq_no->cy_valueint : -1,
01386                                                 err_rc);
01387         }
01388 
01389         return rc;
01390 }

01510 
01511 struct lookup_cmd_hdlr_tbl {
01512         char *name;
01513         cmd_handler_t cb;
01514 };
01515 
01516 static struct lookup_cmd_hdlr_tbl lookup_config_tbl[] = {
01517         {"route", handle_yaml_config_route},
01518         {"net", handle_yaml_config_net},
01519         {"routing", handle_yaml_config_routing},
01520         {"buffers", handle_yaml_config_buffers},
01521         {NULL, NULL}
01522 };
01523 
01524 static struct lookup_cmd_hdlr_tbl lookup_del_tbl[] = {
01525         {"route", handle_yaml_del_route},
01526         {"net", handle_yaml_del_net},
01527         {"routing", handle_yaml_del_routing},
01528         {NULL, NULL}
01529 };
01530 
01531 static struct lookup_cmd_hdlr_tbl lookup_show_tbl[] = {
01532         {"route", handle_yaml_show_route},
01533         {"net", handle_yaml_show_net},
01534         {"buffers", handle_yaml_show_routing},
01535         {"routing", handle_yaml_show_routing},
01536         {"credits", handle_yaml_show_credits},
01537         {"statistics", handle_yaml_show_stats},
01538         {NULL, NULL}
01539 };
01540 
01541 static cmd_handler_t lookup_fn(char *key,
01542                                struct lookup_cmd_hdlr_tbl *tbl)
01543 {
01544         int i;
01545         if (key == NULL)
01546                 return NULL;
01547 
01548         for (i = 0; tbl[i].name != NULL; i++) {
01549                 if (strncmp(key, tbl[i].name, strlen(tbl[i].name)) == 0)
01550                         return tbl[i].cb;
01551         }
01552 
01553         return NULL;
01554 }
01555 
01556 static int lustre_yaml_cb_helper(char *f, struct lookup_cmd_hdlr_tbl *table,
01557                                  struct cYAML **show_rc, struct cYAML **err_rc)
01558 {
01559         struct cYAML *tree, *item = NULL, *head, *child;
01560         cmd_handler_t cb;
01561         char err_str[LNET_MAX_STR_LEN];
01562         int rc = LUSTRE_CFG_RC_NO_ERR, return_rc = LUSTRE_CFG_RC_NO_ERR;
01563 
01564         tree = cYAML_build_tree(f, NULL, 0, err_rc);
01565         if (tree == NULL)
01566                 return LUSTRE_CFG_RC_BAD_PARAM;
01567 
01568         child = tree->cy_child;
01569         while (child != NULL) {
01570                 cb = lookup_fn(child->cy_string, table);
01571                 if (cb == NULL) {
01572                         snprintf(err_str, sizeof(err_str),
01573                                 "\"call back for '%s' not found\"",
01574                                 child->cy_string);
01575                         cYAML_build_error(LUSTRE_CFG_RC_BAD_PARAM, -1,
01576                                         "yaml", "helper", err_str, err_rc);
01577                         goto out;
01578                 }
01579 
01580                 if (cYAML_is_sequence(child)) {
01581                         while ((head = cYAML_get_next_seq_item(child, &item))
01582                                != NULL) {
01583                                 rc = cb(head, show_rc, err_rc);
01584                                 if (rc != LUSTRE_CFG_RC_NO_ERR)
01585                                         return_rc = rc;
01586                         }
01587                 } else {
01588                         rc = cb(child, show_rc, err_rc);
01589                         if (rc != LUSTRE_CFG_RC_NO_ERR)
01590                                 return_rc = rc;
01591                 }
01592                 item = NULL;
01593                 child = child->cy_next;
01594         }
01595 
01596 out:
01597         cYAML_free_tree(tree);
01598 
01599         return return_rc;
01600 }
01601 
01602 int lustre_yaml_config(char *f, struct cYAML **err_rc)
01603 {
01604         return lustre_yaml_cb_helper(f, lookup_config_tbl,
01605                                      NULL, err_rc);
01606 }
01607 
01608 int lustre_yaml_del(char *f, struct cYAML **err_rc)
01609 {
01610         return lustre_yaml_cb_helper(f, lookup_del_tbl,
01611                                      NULL, err_rc);
01612 }
01613 
01614 int lustre_yaml_show(char *f, struct cYAML **show_rc, struct cYAML **err_rc)
01615 {
01616         return lustre_yaml_cb_helper(f, lookup_show_tbl,
01617                                      show_rc, err_rc);
01618 }
